name: Jonathan Bohannon
text: This location USED to be good. I don't know what happened to them over the last few years. Warm marina sauce used to come with your pizza. Now they'll either give it to you cold, or they won't give it to you without paying an extra 50¢. If …More

name: Ken Dale
text: Good service & great pizza. Best in DC. Take out or delivery only.

name: Johnny Yang
text: Horrible, horrible, HORRIBLE service. If I could give this restaurant zero stars, believe me, I would. I ordered 2 medium pizzas and some wings 2 hours ago and still have not received it yet. Called the store and we were treated rudely. …More

name: Brandon Scott
text: I like this pizza hut. They had good food.

name: Snubbull S
text: An abomination. They don't pick up the phone for at least two minutes when I call. The pizza I ordered took 73 minutes to deliver and we live half a mile from the store. The pizza was lukewarm, and the driver claimed to be the only driver …More

name: Kathrine Feliciano
text: I dislike the fact when I speak to the person who's taking the order cannot understand what I am trying to say. I wish they really would listen carefully and stop interrupting while trying to order. Thanks by the way :)

name: Beni Dakar
text: Mediocre food and adequate service. Horrible Alfredo. Unlikely to return.

name: Rachel Rubenstein
text: We really like Pizza Hut but it always takes so long usually over an 1.5hrs to deliver and we live close by. Probably the last time we order from them.

name: Kyle Yuan
text: This place has been shut down, don't even bother

name: John Nash
text: I opened this account to let everyone know how sorry this place is.  Horrible customer service.  Horrible cold food.  It seems like they don't even care to make money.  Sloppy, pure sloppy.  This is the first time I've ever came to a website to tell how terrible I've been done.

name: Christmas Tree
text: Could not understand the man on the phone. I was very patient, but could not understand anything for a while. Eventually we got to my order and they said they were unable to make most of the pizzas listed on the main Pizza Hut website. I gave up and went to Dominos. $4 for delivery is also ridiculous.

name: Robel Wube
text: Stuff and manger are rude and survive was bad

name: Venise Davis
text: I never had an issue when ordering my food from this location.  I did notice they have CLOSED down not sure what that is about

name: Michael B.
text: Had to wait just under 2 hours to deliver 1 pizza and I finally had to cancel it despite calling twice and the guy telling me the driver was almost there. I asked to be refunded since I paid in advance online. Of course that didn't happen …More

name: jorge escobar
text: No gooooood i have to wait for more then two hours sucks sucks i dont recomend this place

name: Tedy Birru
text: Best service best pizza

name: Michelle Winters
text: Do NOT, I repeat do NOT order food from here. I waited over 2 hours for a pizza. When I called to complain the manager was rude and didn't want to give me my money back. Listen to all the reviews and eat anywhere else.

text: I should have read the reviews before ordering. Just HORRIBLE. They were rude, inattentive and messed up my order . I regret ever ordering that cold and TASTELESS pizza. …More

name: Sandra Bake
text: I ordered a pizza online and only after I paid it showed it would take 3 hours to deliver. Then I called to cancel (there is no way to cancel online). It rang and rang and rang. Finally someone answered and promised to cancel it.

text: very bad service, it was so frustrating that we had to cancel our order

text: Worst!! I waited 3 hours for my pizza and on top of that they messed up my order.

text: Call several 1 times and phone rang out. It certainly set the tone

text: They are always 30 minutes late! Worse customer service ever!

name: Michael Sterner
text: This place doesn't even deserve a star. Pizza always arrives at least an hour and a half late. I honestly don't know why I keep ordering from here.
